PROJECT AYA

Generative Art

Type 1: Still Piece

❮ ❯

Want a stunning digital art piece to own? Purchase a Still Piece created from code in either Processing or p5.js (your choice!) - no AI and you own the rights.

Standard base price: £10 GBP

(Complex designs will increase the pricing. You will be contacted for price revisions after the commission has been reviewed.)


Type 2: Dynamic Piece

❮ ❯

Want a moving digital art piece? From audio-visuals to interactivity, we've got your interests covered! Base price does not include providing audio.

Standard base price:£20 GBP

(Complex designs will increase the pricing. You will be contacted for price revisions after the commission has been reviewed.)
